definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
sweet snack made from glutinous rice, sugar and honey, common in Changsha 長沙|长沙[Chang2 sha1], Hunan

sentences.english: The mother I had in mind for myself was middle-aged with brown hair pulled back in a bun .
sentences.chinese: 我心目中的母親是梳粑粑頭的棕發中年婦人。

sentences.english: It looks like Tang-yuan, but its colour is green.
sentences.chinese: 艾粑粑看起來像湯圓，但它的顏色的是綠色的。

sentences.english: Glutinous rice cake, or the feelings of the gift delivery.
sentences.chinese: 糯米粑還是傳遞感情的禮品。

definition: rice cake (typically made with glutinous rice flour and steamed)
(Hakka cuisine) snacks made from glutinous rice flour (rice cakes, noodles etc)
(dialect) maize/corn/also written 苞穀|苞谷[bao1 gu3]
variant of 包穀|包谷[bao1 gu3]
nian gao, New Year cake, typically a sweet, steamed cake made with glutinous rice flour
